properties.entry: SELECT resume_id, user_id, resume_name, created_on_time, last_accessed_time FROM ts_resume.resume where user_id = :userId

SELECT pi.personal_info_id,pi.title,pi.first_name,pi.last_name,pi.name_in_full,pi.dob, pi.email,pi.mobile,pi.profile_summary,pi.home_phone,pi.resume_id, ad.address_id,ad.street,ad.city,ad.state,ad.postal_code,ad.country FROM ts_resume.personal_info pi join ts_resume.address ad on pi.address_id = ad.address_id WHERE pi.resume_id = :resumeId
